description:
Defines the primary product that for which this animal is bred or kept.
If animals are kept for breeding or live trade (sale), specify the end purpose of that breeding/trade.

 - Meat corresponds to UNSPC 50111500 Minimally processed meat and poultry products
 - Milk corresponds to UNSPC 50203200 Raw milk products from live animals
 - Wool corresponds to UNSPC 11131506 Unprocessed wool
